name: Portholes
description:
This is a game for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1!

In this game, you play as a shovel with some very cool teleportation abilities, such as...  creating PORTHOLES!!! Pretty clever name right. ;) 

You can only have two portals placed down at a time, so plan well. 

-CONTROLS-

  • "Q" or Left Mouse Button over the ground will place portal #1.
  • "E" or Right Mouse Button over the ground will place portal #2.
  • Classic WASD or Arrow Key movement. No Jumping.
  • "Space" over end portal to beat the level.

-GOAL-

Your goal in this game is to go through the levels in which ever order you want and get to the end portal. Press "Space" on the end portal to beat the level.

I hope everyone enjoys this game and please don't judge too hard! This is my very first game jam. I have also never worked with portals before, so hopefully this wasn't too bad of a first try.
